featureDescription.name: offset
featureDescription.description: The offset of the passage in the parent document. The significance of the exact value may depend on the source corpus. They should be sequential and identify the passage's position in the document. Since pubmed is extracted from an XML file, the title has an offset of zero, while the abstract is assumed to begin after the title and one space.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The original text of the passage.

featureDescription.name: infons
featureDescription.description: Information of text in the passage. For PubMed references, it might be "title" or "abstract". For full text papers, it might be Introduction, Methods, Results, or Conclusions. Or they might be paragraphs.

featureDescription.name: annotations
featureDescription.description: Annotations on the text of the passage.

featureDescription.name: relations
featureDescription.description: Relations between the annotations and possibly other relations on the text of the passage.
